thread.title: Louis C.K. to debut two stand-up specials on Netflix
thread.title_full: Louis C.K. to debut two stand-up specials on Netflix

author: Kelly Lawler
title: Louis C.K. to debut two stand-up specials on Netflix
text:
Louis C.K. to debut two stand-up specials on Netflix Kelly Lawler , USA TODAY 12:28 p.m. ET Feb. 22, 2017 
Louis C.K. (Photo: Kevin Mazur, Getty Images for The Bob Woodruff Foundation) 
Louis C.K. is returning to a TV near you, but not for Louie . 
The comedian has two stand-up specials in the pipeline for Netflix. The first special is called 2017 , and has already been filmed in Washington, D.C. The second special has neither a title nor a release date as of press time. 
C.K. has had a varied group of projects recently. He voiced a dog in last summer's The Secret Life of Pets, and is lending his voice to FX's upcoming animated series, Cops , due later this year. He also lent his talents to the annual Stand Up for Heroes benefit at the New York Comedy Festival . 
Netflix has long had a wealth of comedians on its stand-up special roster. It released its latest, Trevor Noah: Afraid of the Dark, featuring the Daily Show host Tuesday. They also nabbed two upcoming specials from Chris Rock . 
The comedian's 2017 will hit Netflix on April 4. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2m8jZQt Most Popular
